full_summary:
=================================
### [English] Traveler Modernization Project
### [French] Projet de modernisation des voyageurs
#### Solicitation Number
> PR51458 - 1000402713

#### [English] Publication Date
> 2023-05-19

#### Closing Date
> 2023-06-09

#### Description
The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is seeking a three (3) resources to perform project management services for Projects and Service Management Directorate within Information Science and Technology Branch. The purpose of these services is to support planning and execution of departmental IM/IT initiatives managed by the Information, Science and Technology Branch and the Traveler's Branch.

#### Requirements
- The successful bidder will provide three (3) resources to support planning and execution of departmental IM/IT initiatives.
- Services will be rendered on an as-and-when-ordered basis, through the issuance of Task Authorizations (TAs).
- The successful bidder must have experience in project management, resource planning, budgeting, and cost control.
- The successful bidder must be able to communicate effectively in both English and French

#### Applicable Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the trade agreements listed below:
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

#### Contact Information
Please contact [Nataliya Sekret](mailto:Nataliya.Sekret@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca) at (343) 553-8542 for more information.

#### Tender Documents
Please refer to the attachment below for tender documents:

[English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5710/pr51458---1000402713---rfp-_0.pdf)
